projects.title: Cyber Raid
projects.description: Cyber Raid is a high-speed sci-fi shooter with procedurally generated enemies, AI-controlled squads, and dynamic effects. Built in Unity using ECS, Shader Graph, and Zenject.

projects.title: Night Stalker
projects.description: A stealth-based horror game where players navigate through a dystopian future city. Features advanced AI behavior systems and dynamic lighting. Built using Unity's URP and custom gameplay systems.
